name: missionpestcontrol
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mission pest control
Developer Terms of Use
des:
As a locally run business, Mission Pest Control is dedicated in providing the most effective and safest ways to protect and service your home. Our daily employee training to both in the field as well as our office team members allow Mission to be both experts in pest control and leaders in our industry.

With over 12 years servicing experience right here in the Southern California area we know what you're up against. Our Mission team members are dedicated to helping you prevent and manage your current pest need. Mission Pest Control is committed to providing the best service available. Our team is trained daily in the control services, safety, and customer relationships. We take great pride in providing a service that is continually being regulated to give you the best pet and family-friendly products while still maintaining an effective defense against unwanted pests. This is your home and should be a safe place free of pests without compromise!

The Alexa skill of Mission pest control can help you by checking your previous service dates, your upcoming service requests/ appointments, and also help you schedule a call to arrange for service. 

Say Alexa launch mission pest control to get started.
